Kate Macer.Action: Mumbles the Lord's Prayer under her breath, desperate to finish before having to kill or be killed.
Leaps from vehicle into violent SWAT operation with rifle raised.
After intense combat and narrowly escaping death, she quickly assures the SWAT officer she is okay.
Focuses on the grim details of the scene—the skull embedded in the wall—without showing outward emotional distress, indicating a reserved or detached reaction.
Ducks quickly as a shotgun blast narrowly misses her, showing situational awareness and quick reflexes.
Returns fire aggressively and effectively, contributing to neutralizing the threat.
Sits down gasping for breath after adrenaline hits her, showing physical limit under extreme stress but also recovery.
Attempts to process and understand the shocking sight of a skull embedded in the wall, demonstrating composure in chaotic and disturbing circumstances.
Sits with fellow officers experiencing shared trauma, showing vulnerability by admitting she can't shake the smell.
Engages in tense but truthful banter with Lance Alvarez, highlighting the human cost of the crimes with a sincere, somber tone.
Leads effort to create a six foot hole in the wall to access the house.

Retrieves a piece of bone embedded in her scalp and carefully wraps it in toilet paper before returning to shower, showing presence of mind and self-care after injury.
